name: 埃利亚斯·吉安纳卡基斯
awards: 2013年 第16届上海国际电影节 金爵奖 最佳影片 (提名) 盗婴疑云
name_full: 埃利亚斯·吉安纳卡基斯 Elias Giannakakis
introduction: Elias Giannakakis (born in 1968) is a film director, screenwriter and producer of fiction and documentary films. He has shot over one hundred documentaries tackling a variety of subject matters.Since 2000 he has been a regular collaborator of the ET1 television arts and culture documentary series, Paraskinio.He has filmed two fantasy short films, Last Act (1996) and Patagonia (1999).His feature-length films, Alemaya (2004) and Hara (2012), both address the theme of the female psyche.
